\w There|strong="H3426"\w* \w were|strong="H3426"\w* also some \w who|strong="H3426"\w* said, “We \w are|strong="H3426"\w* \w mortgaging|strong="H6148"\w* \w our|strong="H3947"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, \w our|strong="H3947"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H3947"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*.
